author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Further correction for ring number assignment of scintillator hits in HGCal geometry versions V14, V15, V16 and V17

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is a bug fix for all  versions of HGCal geometry
title: Phase2-hgx323 Further correction for ring number assignment of scintillator hits in HGCal geometry versions beyond V13
